item.title: docker-containers
item.description: link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGz9DS-aIeY where virtual machines virtualise hardware, docker virtualises OSs. Each of the containers uses the same underlying kernel. This is why its so fast.

item.title: virtual-machines
item.description: link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wX75Z-4MEoM What is a virtual Machine A computer inside a computer. A computer contains hardware, cpu, ram , storage, etc.
